function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased travel to green areas outside residence","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in different areas","Mitigation":"Encourage adherence to public health guidelines in outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Public health messaging, signage, and education","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Preference for urban parks and crowded areas for physical exercise","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion in crowded urban spaces","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor activities in less crowded areas and emphasize physical distancing","Technologies":"Mobile apps for finding less crowded outdoor spaces, public health guidelines dissemination","People":"Visitors to urban parks and crowded areas","Owner":"Local governments, park authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in non-essential activities and social interactions in green areas","Impact":"Risk of contagion due to social interactions and non-essential activities","Mitigation":"Educate about the importance of physical distancing and adherence to safety measures","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, public health announcements, informational websites","People":"General public using green spaces","Owner":"Public health agencies, local governments"}]}
